javadoc.text: * PNodeFilter is a interface that filters (accepts or rejects) nodes. * Its main use is to retrieve all the children of a node the meet some criteria * by using the method PNode.getAllNodes(collection, filter); *
javadoc.author: Jesse Grosjean

javadoc.text: * Return true if the filter should accept the given node.
javadoc.return: true if node should be accepted

javadoc.text: * Return true if the filter should test the children of the given node for * acceptance.
javadoc.return: true if children should be tested for acceptance
